items.summary: Explore how AI learning in robotics can engage students with the Launcher AI+ activity on SPIKE Prime. Build a robot that learns from feedback. No new hardware needed—just a deeper dive into AI principles.

LEGO Education announces its new Computer Science & AI sets, extending SPIKE Prime and Essential support until 2031. Discover how these sets evolve within classrooms as RoboCamp reviews educational robotics.

For six years, RoboCamp has inspired teachers to expand robotics lessons with tools like 3D printers and laser cutters, enriching the SPIKE Prime experience and inspiring limitless creativity in students.
Engage young students with Cosmic Battle, a sci-fi inspired project using SPIKE Essential to teach coding and robotics. Let starships duel in your classroom and ignite interest in STEM learning.
Unlock the full potential of SPIKE Prime with 3D printing in your robotics classes. Embrace creative freedom or tackle logistical challenges—your choice could redefine educational experiences.

RoboCamp invites students to recreate Snake and Arkanoid using SPIKE Prime and Python, inspiring future programmers by exploring the mechanics of classic games and providing a hands-on coding experience.
Create a moving owl model in the Flying Bird project using SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and a laser cutter. Teaching mechanical principles has never been more interactive and fascinating.

Demonstrate centrifugal force with the Carousel model using SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 and a laser cutter. This RoboCamp project combines physics with hands-on learning for an engaging classroom experience.
With 8 new robots for your lessons, transform your class with cranked mechanisms and laser-cut projects. From cranes to carousels, let student creativity shine in RoboCamp's latest offerings.
Build a moving owl model with LEGO SPIKE Prime or mBot 2, featuring wooden elements cut by a laser cutter. Teach mechanical principles in practice with RoboCamp's Flying Bird project.
The Carousel project uses SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and a laser cutter to visualize centrifugal force in action. Enhance physics lessons with this hands-on and scientific RoboCamp experience.
Transform classic games into modern coding projects with SPIKE Prime using Python. Let students build and code Snake and Arkanoid, sparking a love for tech through hands-on learning.
Cosmic Battle brings iconic sci-fi ships to life for a classroom duel. Using SPIKE Essential, introduce young students to coding and robotics through this entertaining and unpredictable activity.
Explore endless possibilities with 8 new robot projects, from cranes to flying birds. Utilize laser cutters and the SPIKE Prime and mBot 2 sets for a dynamic educational experience.
Measure wind strength with a spike prime and a 3D-printed propeller in this STEM lesson. Combine engineering and real-world data for an engaging class experience with RoboCamp's innovative plan.
